attributes.action: Stop  recycling companies to make unfair profit& install cash recycling machines
attributes.additional_details:
In Germany people are stimulate to recycle their used glass&plastic bottles due to these cash recycling machines . 
I can not understand how is possible to pay council tax,you drop your valuable recyclable material in green bins tham someone makes profits . With this method you can avoid the waste mixing and people will be happy the councils will be happy . 
I believe is not much to recived 10-15 pence back for a glass bottle wich you already paid for .
attributes.background: I propose to install cash/vouchers recycling machine/points arpund the country and stop the big recycling industry sharks to make huge unfair profits.Example when people buy beer/juice etc. they are already pay for the bottles/cans so I believe they should have right to recover money already payd
